plham.util

Class RandomHelper

  • plham.util.RandomHelper
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JSONRandom

    public class RandomHelper
    A helper class adding more utilities to x10.util.Random.

      • nextExponential

        public x10.lang.Double nextExponential(x10.lang.Double lambda)
        Get a sample from an exponential distribution, whose expected value is lambda. Cf: the standard notation may prefer the expected value to be 1 / lambda, but here it is lambda so lambda can take even zero.
